opensonata.dataDisplays.ReadoutListener

opensonata.dataDisplays.ReadoutListener Interface Reference

Inheritance diagram for opensonata.dataDisplays.ReadoutListener:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void readoutData (ReadoutPlot source, double xPlotValue, double yPlotValue)

Detailed Description

An interface used with ReadoutPlot that is called when a new x,y position is to be read out.

Definition at line 51 of file ReadoutListener.java.

Member Function Documentation

void opensonata.dataDisplays.ReadoutListener.readoutData ( ReadoutPlot  source,
double  xPlotValue,
double  yPlotValue 
)

Notify that a given xValue, yValue in the specified plot has been selected for readout.

Parameters:
source The plot containing the readout data.
xPlotValue The xvalue of the plot position.
yPlotValue The yvalue of the plot position.

Implemented in opensonata.dataDisplays.BaselineDisplay, and opensonata.dataDisplays.WaterfallDisplay.
